18.「そして 奴は すでに その野望をかなえて| 用なしとなった私は そのまま| こ: And now that he has fulfilled his ambition, I|am no longer of any use to him, and he has|left me here.

28.トラマナ石のチカラで 結界は消し飛んだ！: The power of the Safe Pass Stone has|obliterated the wards!
